event.summary: The Workshop would be based on making inferences through the sensors present on our Android Phones.

event.name: Civil Buzz
event.detail:
Problem Statement

A Day in Life of Civil Engineer.

Description

Does trekking excite you? Did you ever get tangled in those lines on the map? Have you ever deciphered the rocks around you? Have you ever wondered what the civil engineers do out there with those instruments with them? Welcome to Civil Buzz Tech Tatva 2014. Civil Buzz Workshop will be your chance to learn all about those instruments, rocks and minerals, topographical maps and many of the basic concepts of Civil Engineering that you have always wondered about. It will be an insight for you in the world of a civil engineer and its little known application in your life.

Duration

1 day - 3 hours

Contact

Event Head

Rohith Bihani Contact: 09886544204
event.summary: To give general terminologies used in Civil Engineering and there application. Such as knowledge of Contours, reading maps, getting topography of a region, Basic information about beams, columns, slab etc.

event.name: Concreation

event.summary: It would give you into design of a concrete mix of particular strength and also the pre-requiste knowledge required to cast the cubes.

event.name: ROBOCODE
event.detail:
Problem Statement

Introduction to the RoboCode library

Description

The RoboCode library is used to create an artificial environment where bot fights are simulated. Last bot standing is the winner. Day 1: Introduction to the RoboCode library. Day 2: Intermediate RoboCode concepts and bot design Day 3: Introduction to advanced design and strategies

Duration

3 Days

Contact

Event Head

Kalim Akram: 8867612111
event.summary: The workshop is going to focus on Open Source RoboCode libraries based in Java.The workshop is NOT for those who haven't worked/studied Java yet, since the RoboCode library is quite advanced.

event.name: MOBIVISION
event.detail:
Problem Statement

Introduction to app development in Android

Description

Android as a platform is ever growing and is currently extremely popular. The workshop introduces participants to app development on the Android platform. Day 1: Introduction to the android environment and installation of the sdk. Day 2: Intermediate android concepts Day 3: Introduction to advanced android topics

Duration

3 Days

Contact

Event Head

Kartik Arora:8197738959
event.summary: Workshop shall be an introduction to Android development. Enthusiasts shall be presented an opportunity to learn app design, create their personal design sheets and use that on the app that they would code.

event.name: GAMEDEV

Day 1: Introduction to the libgdx library and it's installation.
Day 2: Intermediate libgdx concepts
Day 3: Introduction to advanced libgdx topics

Duration

3 Days

Contact

Event Head

Mukund Goyal: 9740464079
event.summary: The Libgdx library is used for 2D games. The aim of the workshop is to introduce and teach participants about the Libgdx library and how it can be used to create a 2d game.

event.name: Chem-E-Car
event.detail:
Problem Statement

Use of Chemical reactions to make a car.

Description

THE WORKSHOP IS FOR THE EVENT CHEM E CAR WHERE THE TEAMS HAVE TO DESIGN A CAR WHICH RUNS ON CHEMICAL REACTIONS. THE TEAMS WILL BE GIVEN COMPLETE INFO ABOUT THE CAR DESIGN AT THE WORKSHOP.THEY WILL BE TOLD ABOUT THE REACTIONS THAT CAN BE USED TO PROPEL THE CAR. THEY WILL ALSO BE SHOWN THE PROTOTYPE OF THE CAR.THEY CAN ALSO CLARIFY ANY DOUBTS REGARDING THE CAR PROTOTYPE AND REACTION. THE FIRST ROUND OF THE EVENT WILL BE CONDUCTED AFTER THE WORKSHOP.

Duration

2 HRS

Contact

Event Head

Arjun : +919400965738
event.summary: A workshop on the reactions that can be used for the working of a chemical reaction powered car.
